December 21, 1961
Mr. Richard Hull, Director
Radio and TV Broadcasting
The Ohio State University
2470 N. Starr Road
Columbus 21, Ohio
Dear Dick:
Just a note to extend official congratulations on your
reelection to the Television Board. I think you know that this means
a good deal to me, both officially and personally, to have you parti¬
cipating in the Board deliberations, since I count heavily on your
leadership and judgment.
As regards the Chairmanship of the Board, I'll keep my
fingers crossed but hope that you are chosen to continue in this im¬
portant position.
Cordially yours,
William G. Harley
WGH;ob
